<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Psyche](/Feats.aspx?ID=3696) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 29</row>

</column>

---

You've segmented your psyche so it can operate in tandem. When you [Unleash your Psyche](/Actions.aspx?ID=1222), you can double its duration.
name: Twin Psyche
